ProductInfo.Features:
2.4-inch TFT LCD display; SNS integration; MP3/eAAC+ and MP4/H.264 player; Optical trackpad; full QWERTY keyboard; 3.5mm jack; Organizer; Voice memo and Predictive text input.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
2 MP camera, 1600x1200 pixels with video recording; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g; Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP (Stereo); Stereo FM radio with RDS; FM recording and microSD, up to 8GB.
This unlocked cell phone will work on GSM carries like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Talk time up to 12 hours - Standby up to 520 hs.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Ch@t 335 Unlocked Phone with Bluetooth, 2MP Camera, Wi-Fi and QWERTY Keyboard - No Warranty - Black
